item.title: Howard, Rebecca Moore. 'History, Politics, Pedagogy, and Advanced Writing'
item.description: One Liner Calls for moving from advanced composition to an advanced undergraduate writing curriculum. Summary What are the salient points. Think about what the piece is, the argument, etc Uses, Thoughts, and Connections What do you think about it, how might you use this, does it fit?
